channel.title: SFoL15:Grand Idea (Canned/Lit Club Win)
channel.description:
# Hello you bootiFoL people I'm your host of GRAND IDEA FOL
**Rules** Follow all Global Rules Don't be a dick/gamethrow/~~massclaimD2~~ My word is law, you have a problem take it up with me in DMs Praise Monika or Atua to prove you read these *IF YOU WISH* **SPECIAL MECCHANICCSS** https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grand-idea-mafia-fol-edition/1488/1 See this thread, it has 160ish classes all able to be rolled! Will it be balanced, fucking of course not! WIll there be mod errors..most likely as this is a NOZ APPROVED GAME (patent pending) which means there will be at least ONE MOD ERROR. Will it be fun OF FUCKING COURSE
## Gameplay * Days last 96 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 48 hours. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread.
## Executions * To accuse someone say "/accuse [player]" or "/vote [player]" * The King can't be accused of treason until Day 4. * Votes saying Execute or Pardon before the target is on the stand will not be counted. * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will go on trial. They can give a defence, and the rest of the players must vote Execute or Pardon on the thread. * Players can discuss while the target is on trial. * No one is able to use day powers when a trial is in session. The only exception is the king’s Decide Fate. * Every trial will go on for 24 hours. However, if The King uses decide fate it will be cut short. * The day timer does not stop when the target is on trial. * If the option with the most votes is what happens to the target.
## Picking a New King * If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * After a king’s execution the day does not end, an election shall be held right after. * When the king dies 24 hours is given for any player with royal blood to step up and take the throne. * After that 24 hours anyone is free to step up. * If only 1 person steps up when the day ends that person becomes the king * If 2 people step forward everyone votes on who should be the next king. Whoever has the most votes at the end of the day becomes the king. If the votes are tied whoever stepped up 1st becomes the king
## Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
## Death Notes * Need to be drawn * Submitted with the kills
**SIGNUPS** To Join say **/join** or **/sign** 1.Nuclear Burrito 2.Marluxion 3.Polik 4.NightX 5.Insanity 6.Vulgard 7.Ici-Bagel 8.Simon 9.Cheesy 10.SuperJack 11.Wolfy 12.Dama 13.PKR 14.Hippo 15.Orange 16.Mincinmind
GRAVE YARD **Noz's Sanity-Died 2/21/18 on 21:01 CST** **Marl-[color=pink] Yuri [/color]** **Insanity-[color=pink] Club King [/color]** **NightX-[color=steblue] Suicdal Citizen [/color]**
# COME JOIN US AND PRAISE ATUA OR MONIKA
